outputs.output_descr: This project aims to provide support to strengthen the justice sector and human rights in the Maldives in line with international standards and best practices.  In addition, the project aims to increase individuals ability to know and claim their rights and have access to a remedy for their grievances as well as strengthen institutional capacities to better address the needs of people notably the marginalized and disadvantaged.

project_descr: PROTECTING HUMAN RIGHTS AND PROMOTING ACCESS TO JUSTICE IN THE MALDIVES
project_title: HUMAN RIGHTS AND ACCESS TO JUSTICE
